text: The Men's 77 kg event at the 2010 South American Games was held over March 28 at 14:00. Although there was a tie for first place, Yony Andica, from Colombia, won due to a lower bodyweight. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Yony Andica '''' |Jose Ocando '''' |Freddy Tenorio '''' |} ==Results== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! rowspan=2|Rank !! width=200 rowspan=2|Athlete !! width=80 rowspan=2|Bodyweight !! width=150 colspan=3|Snatch !! width=150 colspan=3|Clean & Jerk !! width=60 rowspan=2|Total |- ! 1 !! 2 !! 3 !! 1 !! 2 !! 3 |- bgcolor=gold | |align=left| | 75.18 || 140 || 144 || 146 || 183 || 185 || ~~188~~ || 331 |-bgcolor=silver | |align=left| | 76.85 || 140 || 144 || 146 || 185 || ~~186~~ || ~~187~~ || 331 |-bgcolor=cc9966 | |align=left| | 75.67 || 135 || 140 || 145 || 168 || 175 || ~~183~~ || 320 |- |4 |align=left| | 72.91 || 126 || 131 || ~~135~~ || 155 || 160 || 165 || 296 |- |5 |align=left| | 76.61 || 118 || 122 || ~~126~~ || ~~147~~ || ~~147~~ || 147 || 269 |- |6 |align=left| | 75.91 || 100 || ~~106~~ || 107 || 125 || 132 || 137 || 244 |- |7 |align=left| | 75.00 || 102 || 107 || ~~110~~ || 115 || ~~120~~ || ~~120~~ || 222 |- |8 |align=left| | 74.67 || 76 || 79 || 86 || 104 || 107 || ~~111~~ || 193 |- |} ==New Records== {| !width=100| !width=100| !width=200| !width=80| |- | Clean & Jerk || 183 kg || || GR |- | Clean & Jerk || 185 kg || || GR |- | Total || 331 kg || || GR |} ==References== *Final 77kg M
